text: In the Name of the Fatherland () is a 1943 Soviet war movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin and Dmitriy Vasilyev.ВО ИМЯ РОДИНЫВо имя Родины (1943) The movie is based on the play Russian People by Konstantin Simonov. It stars Nikolai Kryuchkov, Yelena Tyapkina, and Mikhail Zharov. ==Actors== * Nikolai Kryuchkov - Safonov * Yelena Tyapkina - Safonova * Mikhail Zharov - Globa * Mariya Pastukhova - Valya * Olga Zhiznyeva - Mariya Kharitonovna * Fyodor Kurikhin - Vasin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1943 war movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin Category:Movies directed by Dmitri Vasilyev
title: In the Name of the Fatherland
